entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Deep River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:13 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 06:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: W 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning early in the afternoon. Snow with ice pellets in the afternoon and with freezing rain late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
